key_risks: Regulatory and legal scrutiny from shareholder investigations and federal oversight
Higher leverage with a debt-to-equity ratio of 1.45, raising concerns about debt management
Vulnerability to economic downturns due to focus on underserved markets and real estate
Intense competition from larger banks and fintech companies
Dependence on third-party technology providers for digital transformation
controversies: Multiple shareholder investigations into potential breaches of fiduciary duty
FDIC-related controversies around predatory lending practices indirectly impacting reputation
social_issues: Focus on underserved markets and affordable housing aligns with ESG initiatives but faces economic sensitivity risks
governance_issues: Potential governance changes due to shareholder investigations
Recent appointment of Crowe LLP as independent auditor to strengthen financial oversight

sources.title: Broadway Financial Corporation Faces Regulatory Non-Compliance and ...
